mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') BOARD_DATE , BOARD_VIEW , ENAME FROM BOARD, EMP WHERE BOARD_MENU_CODE = 'BOARD_MENU_001' AND BOARD_STATUS = 1 AND BOARD_WRITER = EMPNO ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC

SELECT BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') BOARD_DATE , BOARD_VIEW , ENAME FROM BOARD, EMP WHERE BOARD_MENU_CODE = 'BOARD_MENU_001' AND IS_IMPORTANT = 'Y' AND BOARD_STATUS = 1 AND BOARD_WRITER = EMPNO ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') BOARD_DATE , BOARD_VIEW , IS_IMPORTANT , ENAME , BOARD_MENU_CODE , LAG(BOARD_NUM, 1, 'BOARD_000') OVER(PARTITION BY BOARD_MENU_CODE ORDER BY BOARD_NUM) AS BOARD_PREV_NUM , LAG(BOARD_TITLE, 1, '이전 글이 없습니다.') OVER(PARTITION BY BOARD_MENU_CODE ORDER BY BOARD_NUM) AS BOARD_PREV_TITLE , LEAD(BOARD_NUM, 1, 'BOARD_000') OVER(PARTITION BY BOARD_MENU_CODE ORDER BY BOARD_NUM) AS BOARD_NEXT_NUM , LEAD(BOARD_TITLE, 1, '다음 글이 없습니다.') OVER(PARTITION BY BOARD_MENU_CODE ORDER BY BOARD_NUM) AS BOARD_NEXT_TITLE FROM BOARD, EMP WHERE BOARD_WRITER = EMPNO) WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_VIEW = BOARD_VIEW + 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum} AND BOARD_MENU_CODE = 'BOARD_MENU_001'
